content.question: Let R be the region enclosed by the graph of <math> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>1</mn> <mo>+</mo> <mtext>ln</mtext> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mi>c</mi> <mi>o</mi> <msup> <mi>s</mi> <mn>4</mn> </msup> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> </math> , the x-axis, and the lines x=−2/3 and x=2/3.
